article_title: Xerox IR Head Gets Second Interim Stint as CFO Heads to Diageo
article_text: It’s déjà vu all over again for Leslie Varon, head of investor relations and former controller for Xerox Corp. At the end of the month she’ll take the post of top financial officer for the second time in as many years while the technology firm searches externally for a successor to Kathryn Mikells.
